about_the_game:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

The scenario "Northern Campaign of Jiang Wei" will be added.

▼Northern Campaign of Jiang Wei
Following the death of Zhuge Liang, Jiang Wei inherits the great strategists goals and invades the north.
At the same time, Zhuge Dan and others rebel against Sima Yi and the continent is once more plunged into war.
detailed_description:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

The scenario "Northern Campaign of Jiang Wei" will be added.

▼Northern Campaign of Jiang Wei
Following the death of Zhuge Liang, Jiang Wei inherits the great strategists goals and invades the north.
At the same time, Zhuge Dan and others rebel against Sima Yi and the continent is once more plunged into war.

fullgame.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII

name: RTK13WPK - Additional scenario "Northern Campaign of Jiang Wei" 追加シナリオ「姜維北伐」

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
